specialRules.name: Spotter
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +6" range next time it shoots.

specialRules.name: Megaphone
specialRules.description: This model and its unit move +2" on Advance, and +4” on Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Cult Banner
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Flare Gun
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +2" on Advance and +4" on Rush/Charge next time it moves.

specialRules.name: Tactical Console
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one other friendly unit within 12", which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model attacks in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make 1 attack at Quality 2+ with AP(1) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Experiments
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one bonus to all models with this rule. On a 1-3 attacks get Rending, on a 4-6 attacks get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Survey Vehicle
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18". Next time a friendly unit shoots at it, it gets +1 to hit.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Warning Cry
specialRules.description: Enemy units  using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model.

specialRules.name: Agitator
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Furious. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits from Furious on unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit instead.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds don’t carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Focus Fire
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets AP(+1) next time it shoots.

specialRules.name: Intimidating Presence
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 12", which gets -2 to its next morale test roll.

specialRules.name: Battle Drills
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Furious. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits from Furious on unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit instead.

specialRules.name: Take Aim
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

specialRules.name: Company Standard
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get +1 to their next morale test roll.

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Robot
specialRules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Hold the Line
specialRules.description: Whenever this model's unit fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, it counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Field Radio
specialRules.description: If this unit has a model with the Double Time, Focus Fire or Take Aim rule, then it may use it on units that have a Field Radio up to 24" away.

specialRules.name: Double Time
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one other friendly unit within 12", which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Good Shot
specialRules.description: This model shoots at Quality 4+.

specialRules.name: Protected
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Warning Cry
specialRules.description: Enemy units  using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Blind Faith
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Stealth.

specialRules.name: Rangefinder Backpack
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

specialRules.name: Holy Statue
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get +1 to hit next time they fight in melee.

specialRules.name: Highly Devout
specialRules.description: When shooting at enemies within 12", unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Spiritual Guidance
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get AP(+1) when shooting.

specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Protective Aura
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get +1 to defense rolls next time they take hits.

specialRules.name: Canticle Megaphone
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get +1 to morale test rolls.

specialRules.name: Protected
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Celestial Veteran
specialRules.description: Gets +1 to hit in melee and shooting.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When shooting at enemies within 12", unmodified rolls of 6 to hit deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: War Hymns
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get AP(+1) in melee.

specialRules.name: Frenzy
specialRules.description: Counts as having Furious and gets AP(+1) when charging.

specialRules.name: Angelic Aura
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get +1 to their next morale test roll.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified rolls of 6 to hit in melee deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Rallying Call
specialRules.description: Whilst this model and its unit are inside terrain, they get +1 to hit rolls when shooting.

specialRules.name: Scrap Ammo
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Rending when shooting.

specialRules.name: Carnivore
specialRules.description: Gets +1 to hit in melee.

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Dodge
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit in melee when attacking units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Prowl
specialRules.description: Whilst this model and its unit are inside terrain, enemies over 12" away get -2 to hit when shooting at them.

specialRules.name: Battle Call
specialRules.description: Whilst this model and its unit are inside terrain, they get +1 to hit rolls in melee.

specialRules.name: Taser
specialRules.description: Unmodified rolls of 6 to hit deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Beacon
specialRules.description: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are deployed within 6" of this model.

specialRules.name: Hidden Route
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Ambush.

specialRules.name: Bounding
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, you may place all models with this rule in it anywhere within D3+1" of their position.

specialRules.name: Protected
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Stinger Bombs
specialRules.description: Once per activation, when this model moves over enemy units, pick one of them and roll one die. On a roll of 6+ it takes 1 hit.

specialRules.name: Charged Ammo
specialRules.description: Counts as having the Ambush rule, and gets AP(+2) when shooting on the round in which it deploys.

specialRules.name: Advanced Bombs
specialRules.description: Once per activation, when this model moves over enemy units, pick one of them and roll one die. On a roll of 6+ it takes 3 hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

forceOrgErrors: May not bring any single unit worth more than 35% of total points (1045pts).
